nodes.text: Galactic Moon Coins were tokens given to spacers by celebrants of the Galactic Moon Festival. If the celebrants were impressed or scared of a spacers costume, they would give them these coins. The coins could be given to Z'ozpheratu in exchange for a number of prizes. These coins had the face of Jabba the Hutt imprinted on both sides.

Galactic Moon Coins were tokens awarded to players in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, who participated in the Galactic Moon Festival event. By collecting this tokens, they could turn them into Z'ozpheratu, who was actually a Non-Player Character (NPC), for various items.
